items.content_html: A simple and lightweight Todo app built with React. This app allows users to add tasks, mark them as done by clicking on the task, remove tasks using a button on the right side of each task, clear all tasks with a "Clear All" button, and uncheck tasks by clicking on them again.
items.title: Haileamlak1/react-todo-app: A simple and lightweight Todo app built with React. This app allows users to add tasks, mark them as done by clicking on the task, remove tasks using a button on the right side of each task, clear all tasks with a "Clear All" button, and uncheck tasks by clicking on them again.
